item.title: CVE-2024-47621|2024-10-05T14:37:26.731Z -- katie%20seaborn -- zotpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Katie Seaborn Zotpress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Zotpress: from n/a through 7.3.10.
